org.danja.feedreader.interpreters

Class AtomHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.danja.feedreader.interpreters.FeedHandlerBase
      • org.danja.feedreader.interpreters.AtomHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeedHandler, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler

    public class AtomHandler
extends FeedHandlerBase
    SAX2 handler for Atom XML

    Populates a Feed object (with any contained entries etc.).

    Elements handled : (feed level) id, title, link, published, updated, author (entry level) as feed, plus content

    Titles have any HTML tags removed, and HTML content has a little cleaning/normalization, and links are pulled out of there too.

    Currently uses entry HTML URL as URI, not precise but pragmatic - maybe TODO split url/htmlURL

    TODO class attribute is getting through in content ? fixed? TODO support subtitle, summary

    See Also:
    XMLReaderParser, Feed, Entry, Person, DateStamp, Link
